description: A member of the Silver Tribe, thus having the ability to create spiritual projections of herself, and has also shown the ability of teleportation. The young female has long tresses almost twice her own length, and is the unspoken "leader" of the four Silver Tribe`s Nodos. Yuti`s entire philosophy can be summed up in her first response to Karkinos` question about the fifth Nodos: "People who do not submit to the Silver Tribe have no need to live."
name: Yuty La
